title: KKB by-election: Voters more mature now, political sentiments no longer the choice — analyst
summary:
The result of the Kuala Kubu Baharu (KKB) by-election indicates that Malaysians are becoming more mature in political decisions and are no longer interested in the game of sentiments and perceptions, according to an expert.
